<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6a12e3342d84a1d754d793ed5019778bd60e7494|patch 8.2.2438: out of bounds compiler warning>
patch 8.2.2438: out of bounds compiler warning

Problem:    Out of bounds compiler warning.
Solution:   Increase the size of uf_name.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2438: out of bounds compiler warning · vim/vim@6a12e33
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2438: out of bounds compiler warning · vim/vim@6a12e33
attachments.text: Problem: Out of bounds compiler warning. Solution: Increase the size of uf_name.

patch 8.2.2437: deprecation warnings with default configuration

Solution:   Add -Wno-deprecated-declarations.

Problem:    Vim9 script test is a bit flaky.
Solution:   Wait longer for exit callback.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3445320839a38b3b0c253513b125da8298ec27d6|patch 8.2.2435: setline() gives an error for some types>
patch 8.2.2435: setline() gives an error for some types

Problem:    setline() gives an error for some types.
Solution:   Allow any type, convert each item to a string.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2435: setline() gives an error for some types · vim/vim@3445320
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2435: setline() gives an error for some types · vim/vim@3445320
attachments.text: Problem: setline() gives an error for some types. Solution: Allow any type, convert each item to a string.

Solution:   Add argument type checks. (closes #7759)

patch 8.2.2433: opening cmdline window gives error in BufLeave autocommand

Problem:    Opening cmdline window gives error in BufLeave autocommand.
Solution:   Reset cmdwin_type when triggering the autocommand.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2433: opening cmdline window gives error in BufLeave autoco… · vim/vim@b63f3ca
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2433: opening cmdline window gives error in BufLeave autoco… · vim/vim@b63f3ca
attachments.text: …mmand Problem: Opening cmdline window gives error in BufLeave autocommand. Solution: Reset cmdwin_type when triggering the autocommand.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/76ab5446d530a1c81ead0ee42cb55b4a4d515bad|patch 8.2.2432: libvterm tests are executed even when libtool doesn't…>
patch 8.2.2432: libvterm tests are executed even when libtool doesn't work

Problem:    Libvterm tests are executed even when libtool doesn't work.
Solution:   Only run libvterm tests if /usr/bin/gcc exists.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2432: libvterm tests are executed even when libtool doesn't… · vim/vim@76ab544
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2432: libvterm tests are executed even when libtool doesn't… · vim/vim@76ab544
attachments.text: … work Problem: Libvterm tests are executed even when libtool doesn't work. Solution: Only run libvterm tests if /usr/bin/gcc exists.

patch 8.2.2430: :vimgrep expands wildcards twice

Problem:    :vimgrep expands wildcards twice.
Solution:   Do not expand wildcards a second time.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2430: :vimgrep expands wildcards twice · vim/vim@f8c6a17
attachments.text: Problem: :vimgrep expands wildcards twice. Solution: Do not expand wildcards a second time.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/59ff64079b4fcf0393a7413e3242a8b58c2ceadb|patch 8.2.2429: :goto does not work correctly with text properties>
patch 8.2.2429: :goto does not work correctly with text properties

Problem:    :goto does not work correctly with text properties. (Sam McCall)
Solution:   Add a test. (Andrew Radev)  Also use the text property size when
            computing the remaining offset. (closes #5930)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2429: :goto does not work correctly with text properties · vim/vim@59ff640
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2429: :goto does not work correctly with text properties · vim/vim@59ff640
